00033 #include "KX_BlenderCanvas.h"
00034 #include "DNA_screen_types.h"
00035 #include <stdio.h>

00037 
00038 KX_BlenderCanvas::KX_BlenderCanvas(struct wmWindow *win, RAS_Rect &rect, struct ARegion *ar) :
00039 m_win(win),
00040 m_frame_rect(rect)
00041 {
00042     // initialize area so that it's available for game logic on frame 1 (ImageViewport)
00043     m_area_rect = rect;
00044     // area boundaries needed for mouse coordinates in Letterbox framing mode
00045     m_area_left = ar->winrct.xmin;
00046     m_area_top = ar->winrct.ymax;
00047 }
00048 
00049 KX_BlenderCanvas::~KX_BlenderCanvas()
00050 {
00051 }
00052 
00053 void KX_BlenderCanvas::Init()
00054 {
00055     glDepthFunc(GL_LEQUAL);
00056 }   
00057 
00058 
00059 void KX_BlenderCanvas::SwapBuffers()
00060 {
00061     BL_SwapBuffers(m_win);
00062 }

00064 void KX_BlenderCanvas::ResizeWindow(int width, int height)
00065 {
00066     // Not implemented for the embedded player
00067 }
00068 
00069 void KX_BlenderCanvas::BeginFrame()
00070 {
00071     glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00072     glDepthFunc(GL_LEQUAL);
00073 
00074 }
00075 
00076 
00077 void KX_BlenderCanvas::EndFrame()
00078 {
00079         // this is needed, else blender distorts a lot
00080     glPopAttrib();
00081     glPushAttrib(GL_ALL_ATTRIB_BITS);
00082         
00083     glDisable(GL_FOG);
00084 }

00089 {
00090     glClearColor(r,g,b,a);
00091 }

00094 
00095 void KX_BlenderCanvas::ClearBuffer(int type)
00096 {
00097     int ogltype = 0;
00098 
00099     if (type & RAS_ICanvas::COLOR_BUFFER )
00100         ogltype |= GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT;
00101 
00102     if (type & RAS_ICanvas::DEPTH_BUFFER )
00103         ogltype |= GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT;
00104     glClear(ogltype);
00105 }

00107 int KX_BlenderCanvas::GetWidth(
00108 ) const {
00109     return m_frame_rect.GetWidth();
00110 }
00111 
00112 int KX_BlenderCanvas::GetHeight(
00113 ) const {
00114     return m_frame_rect.GetHeight();
00115 }
00116 
00117 int KX_BlenderCanvas::GetMouseX(int x)
00118 {
00119     float left = GetWindowArea().GetLeft();
00120     return float(x - (left - m_area_left));
00121 }
00122 
00123 int KX_BlenderCanvas::GetMouseY(int y)
00124 {
00125     float top = GetWindowArea().GetTop();
00126     return float(y - (m_area_top - top));
00127 }
00128 
00129 float KX_BlenderCanvas::GetMouseNormalizedX(int x)
00130 {
00131     int can_x = GetMouseX(x);
00132     return float(can_x)/this->GetWidth();
00133 }
00134 
00135 float KX_BlenderCanvas::GetMouseNormalizedY(int y)
00136 {
00137     int can_y = GetMouseY(y);
00138     return float(can_y)/this->GetHeight();
00139 }

00141 RAS_Rect &
00142 KX_BlenderCanvas::
00143 GetWindowArea(
00144 ) {
00145     return m_area_rect;
00146 }   
00147 
00148     void
00149 KX_BlenderCanvas::
00150 SetViewPort(
00151     int x1, int y1,
00152     int x2, int y2
00153 ) {
00154     /*  x1 and y1 are the min pixel coordinate (e.g. 0)
00155         x2 and y2 are the max pixel coordinate
00156         the width,height is calculated including both pixels
00157         therefore: max - min + 1
00158     */
00159     int vp_width = (x2 - x1) + 1;
00160     int vp_height = (y2 - y1) + 1;
00161     int minx = m_frame_rect.GetLeft();
00162     int miny = m_frame_rect.GetBottom();
00163 
00164     m_area_rect.SetLeft(minx + x1);
00165     m_area_rect.SetBottom(miny + y1);
00166     m_area_rect.SetRight(minx + x2);
00167     m_area_rect.SetTop(miny + y2);
00168 
00169     glViewport(minx + x1, miny + y1, vp_width, vp_height);
00170     glScissor(minx + x1, miny + y1, vp_width, vp_height);
00171 }
00172 
00173 
00174 void KX_BlenderCanvas::SetMouseState(RAS_MouseState mousestate)
00175 {
00176     m_mousestate = mousestate;
00177 
00178     switch (mousestate)
00179     {
00180     case MOUSE_INVISIBLE:
00181         {
00182             BL_HideMouse(m_win);
00183             break;
00184         }
00185     case MOUSE_WAIT:
00186         {
00187             BL_WaitMouse(m_win);
00188             break;
00189         }
00190     case MOUSE_NORMAL:
00191         {
00192             BL_NormalMouse(m_win);
00193             break;
00194         }
00195     default:
00196         {
00197         }
00198     }
00199 }

00201 
00202 
00203 //  (0,0) is top left, (width,height) is bottom right
00204 void KX_BlenderCanvas::SetMousePosition(int x,int y)
00205 {
00206     int winX = m_frame_rect.GetLeft();
00207     int winY = m_frame_rect.GetBottom();
00208     int winH = m_frame_rect.GetHeight();
00209     
00210     BL_warp_pointer(m_win, winX + x, winY + (winH-y));
00211 }

00213 
00214 
00215 void KX_BlenderCanvas::MakeScreenShot(const char* filename)
00216 {
00217     ScrArea area_dummy= {0};
00218     area_dummy.totrct.xmin = m_frame_rect.GetLeft();
00219     area_dummy.totrct.xmax = m_frame_rect.GetRight();
00220     area_dummy.totrct.ymin = m_frame_rect.GetBottom();
00221     area_dummy.totrct.ymax = m_frame_rect.GetTop();
00222 
00223     BL_MakeScreenShot(&area_dummy, filename);
00224 }
